title: Ex-Trump Official Exposes GOP’s True View Of Trump And... Yikes
text:
Secrets. Power. Lies.

We'll keep digging -- no matter who wants the truth buried. Become a HuffPost member and fuel reporting they can’t silence.

summary: Anthony Scaramucci explained how the "surface cracks" are "becoming more structural" and foundational.
